dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2388 IH: Poland Visa Waiver Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Quigley (for himself, Ms. Kaptur, and Mr. Lipinski) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To provide that Poland may be designated as a program country under the Visa Waiver Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Poland Visa Waiver Act of 2017.

section.header: Poland made eligible for the Visa Waiver Program
section.text: Notwithstanding any provision of section 217 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1187), the Secretary of Homeland Security may designate Poland as a program country under the visa waiver program established by that section.
